com.hula.lang.parser.util

Class BeanShellUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hula.lang.parser.util.BeanShellUtil

  • public class BeanShellUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides helper methods for working with BeanShell at parse time and runtime. Unfortunately this requires some nasty workarounds to provide helpful context to the user.
